biocontainers.name: melting
biocontainers.summary: Computes, for a nucleic acid duplex, the enthalpy, the entropy and the melting temperature of the helix-coil transitions. three types of hybridisation are possible: dna/dna, dna/rna, and rna/rna.

biotools.summary: Computes, for a nucleic acid duplex, the enthalpy, the entropy and the melting temperature of the helix-coil transitions. Three types of hybridisation are possible: DNA/DNA, DNA/RNA, and RNA/RNA.

bioschemas.name: Melting
bioschemas.summary: Computes, for a nucleic acid duplex, the enthalpy, the entropy and the melting temperature of the helix-coil transitions. Three types of hybridisation are possible: DNA/DNA, DNA/RNA, and RNA/RNA.
